pageTitle: HOYER: REPUBLICAN NATIONAL SALES TAX WOULD RAISE TAXES ON THE MIDDLE CLASS | The Office of Democratic Whip Steny Hoyer
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {8505=“If Republicans remain in power after the November elections, President Bush and Republican Leaders plan to push for a national sales tax to replace the current tax system that will result in a huge tax increase on the middle class and elderly.  At the same time a national sales tax would impose an enormous tax burden on states and localities which will in turn be forced to cut services or raise property taxes even more on the middle class., 9111=September 23, 2004}
